Events.CanCreate:
(switch ; Player must have a mining weapon.
(not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "wI +property:damageMining;")) Nil
True )
Events.OnTargetChosen:
(block ( (targetObj (@ gData 'targetObj))
; The reward for the station is half of the standard ; treasure value for the station.
(rewardExact (/ (obj@ targetObj 'stdTreasure) 2))
; Round it to the nearest 100
(reward (max 100 (* 100 (round (/ rewardExact 100))))) ) (msnSet@ gSource 'reward reward) )

Language.Text:
%TargetName% is threatening a mining colony. Your mission is to destroy the station.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: %reward%

The colony supervisor stands on a plaform at the center of the hall.
"Welcome to %stationName%! If you're looking for work, I might have mission for you."

"%TargetName% in this system has been attacking our mining ships. We'll pay %reward% to go out there and destroy the threat.
"What do you say?"

"Great! The good news is you can use your mining weapon against the station, since it's sitting on an asteroid.
"I'll program the target location into your ship's computer. Come back when you're done."
"Ah, Hell! What are you doing here then? Stop wasting my time!"
"What's wrong? You said you could handle this mission! Get back out there and finish the job!"
"Good work! We've deposited %reward% to your account."
"You let us all down! I thought you could handle this mission. I guess I was wrong."
